title: Cheesy Mushrooms on Toast
ingredients: ['2 slices of thick wholemeal bread', '6 mushrooms', '2 to 4 glugs Worcester sauce', 'large handful grated mature Cheddar cheese', 'large handful grated Wensleydale cheese', '2 dessertspoons soy sauce', '2 dessertspoons butter', '4 plum tomatoes, sliced']
